snippet: Rather than let a vacant Walmart become an eyesore, the city of McAllen spent $24 million to convert it into a 123,000-square-foot public library.
lead_paragraph: Rather than let a vacant Walmart become an eyesore, the city of McAllen spent $24 million to convert it into a 123,000-square-foot public library.

headline.seo: Former Walmart in McAllen Is Now an Airy Public Library
headline.main: Big-Box Store Has New Life as an Airy Public Library
headline.print_headline: Big-Box Store Has New Life as an Airy Public Library
